name: All Those Who Wander
description:
An early prototype, development will continue.

There is a rare softlock in the game, if necessary you can press "R" to reset to title screen.  All other controls are in the game.

To play on Windows, you will need the .exe and the .pck files in the same folder.

Programmer: Brandon Zhou

Artist/Animator: Eric Cervantez

Music from ocremix.org:

Steffan Andrews - The Trial in Concert

DJJD and Jehm Faulking - Tricky Labyrinth

Joshua Morse - Bramble Reprise

Designed on Godot 3.0
